main_definition: Old or from a very long time ago, especially in reference to history or civilization.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Referring to something that existed many years ago and is no longer in existence.
meanings_and_examples.example: The ancient city of Pompeii was buried under volcanic ash from Mount Vesuvius.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Relating to or characteristic of early times, especially the distant past when civilizations were first established.
meanings_and_examples.example: Archaeologists have uncovered ancient tools and pottery at the excavation site.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Considerably old; having been in existence for a very long period of time, typically more than 500 years ago.
meanings_and_examples.example: The museum houses an impressive collection of ancient artifacts from various civilizations around the world.
